mapper.select: SELECT * FROM ( SELECT ROWNUM AS rnum, subquery.* FROM ( SELECT b.banner_number, b.banner_title, b.banner_order_number, fb.file_system_name FROM tbl_banner b JOIN tbl_file_banner fb ON b.banner_number = fb.banner_number ORDER BY BANNER_ORDER_NUMBER ) subquery ) WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{startRow} AND #{endRow}
